com.valensas.vlsync.lib

Class VLSyncHUD

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Dialog
      • com.valensas.vlsync.lib.VLSyncHUD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.DialogInterface, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, android.view.Window.OnWindowDismissedCallback

     class VLSyncHUD
extends android.app.Dialog
    Custom dialog implementation for displaying HUD.

    Created on 1/21/15
    Created @ Valensas
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:

    • Field Detail

      • mMessageText

        private android.widget.TextView mMessageText
        TextView reference for message.

      • mProgressBar

        private android.widget.ProgressBar mProgressBar
        ProgressBar reference for progress.

      • mShowProgress

        private boolean mShowProgress
        If this flag set true, progress is reflected to progress bar. Otherwise, progress bar is indeterminate.

      • mShowProgressText

        private boolean mShowProgressText
        If this flag set true, progress is also shown in text message.

             boolean showProgressText,
             boolean showProgress)
        Create and show VLSyncHUD dialog instance with given options.
        Parameters:
        context - Context that HUD will be drawn.
        showProgressText - flag whether the #mMessageText is visible or not
